tool_description: Find web pages hosted on a domain, including historic pages.

api_list.name: searchDomain
api_list.description: Retrieves a list of web pages hosted on a specified domain.

optional_parameters.name: matchType
optional_parameters.description: Specifies the type of match for the domain search.

optional_parameters.name: url
optional_parameters.description: The domain URL to search for hosted pages.

optional_parameters.name: fl
optional_parameters.description: Fields to return in the response.

optional_parameters.name: limit
optional_parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return.

optional_parameters.name: filter
optional_parameters.description: Filters the results based on specific criteria.
